content.detailedDescription: On april 30th around noon ,i was on my way on a by pass country road to pay a bill. on the way back we had bad weather so i took a picture of the cloulds . not that i saw something but just because i take a lot of pictures of clouds. when i got home i looked at the picture and saw the light first. then i looked to the left in the clouds and enlarged it and saw a object that was rectangle and large. if you inlarge it and lighten it and shadow it you can see it real good. looks wierd .The light was a stright beam of light.
content.summary: Took picture of clouds and saw beam of lightand enlarged the cloulds to the left and saw something in the cloulds.

content.detailedDescription: Shortly before the event i was in my home , the kids were sleeping and my husband was out getting a late dinner from wendy's. i had arrived to my home only a couple hours earlier, after putting the kids to sleep and while my husband was out, i decided to turn the ac unit on, it hasn't been used for a while so i was very startled when shortly after i turned the unit on, the smoke detector alarm started going off. this caught me by surprise and scared me for a second ( i might be a little jumpy about smoke alarms because we did have a house fire , here,  at xmas 2008, that destroyed our home.) the alarm stopped going off on its own within seconds but i was so shook up and startled that i went outside my front door to calm down and have a cigarette. i live in an area where my neighbors have acreage.  as i stood outside my front door looking across the street i saw a huge bright orange light. i've never seen such a bright large round orange light like that before so i continued to look. the light didn't move at first and i started to think it was some sort of helicopter, because the light was hovering. then i realized that a helicopter at this range would be extremely loud. it was silent. after a few minutes, the light changed, i thought the aircraft was turning because of how the light kinda distorted, i realized that the object was now rising from the position i first saw it in. from my point of view i could see that the object wasn't just next to the trees, but it was rising. i was confused as to what i was seeing. the object started to come towards me and i felt a panic because i knew what i saw wasn't a plane or helicopter and it didn't appear to be far away from me to begin with, so as it very very slowly came closer i got scared and i wanted to go inside but i was fascinated with what i was seeing so as it got closer i walked toward the middle of my driveway, i watched as the object flew over the road i live on and went directly over my head. when i saw the object over the street i wondered how it could be so low to the ground moving so slow and not just drop from the sky. as it went directly over my head it flew just over the power lines in my yard, at this point i heard a very faint noise coming from the object. very faint. i had to look directly up to see the underside of this object overhead. i could very clearly make out the outline. at first i thought it was triangular in shape but as i got a better look i could see that it resembled a missile in the way it had a cylinder shape front end and body and some soft edges around what looked like flaps or wings at the bottom or back end ofthe object.The bottom was flat, kinda like what i think a stealth bomber would look like from the underside. the orange light i originally saw was no longer present, but i did see a faint bluefish white light, very small in size, on the object. i also saw on the underside, not the sides or top, a few square lights. randomly lit up. there were multiple square shaped spots that were lit up. these were not windows like on a passenger plan, it reminded me of a display screen with many squares, only a few we're bright, and these were not on the sides, the squares were directly over my head on the very bottom of the object. i watched as it continued on its path over my head, then over the patch of pine trees in my front yard, then it continued over the vacant lot next to me, the object was so low and moving so slow that the feeling of panic came over me again because for a second i thought what i was seeing was a plane, without engine sound, about to crash land. it was so extremely slow, i thought it was going to drop right in front of me but it didn't, and within a few seconds of it flying over head i couldn't see it anymore because it was so slow and low to the ground that once it passed by my trees, the trees blocked my view, that's how low it was. it was very large, like a passenger plane, but it didn't look like any plane i've ever seen. it was so slow moving and silent. it was dead silent that night, no traffic, no noise. if the object was a plane or helicopter i would have known, it was directly over my head. i haven't discussed this with many, only my husband who returned from wendy's just minutes after it flew over head, i thought there was no way in the world he could have not seen it because he would have been traveling toward our house just a few minutes before he arrived home. the speed, the lack of sound and the weird lights on the bottom baffle me. i did make a sketch and illustrate the object and the positions of the lights but i have since lost it, however what i saw is permanently etched in my memory.
content.summary: Saw super big bright orange light, hovering, then it ascended before coming directly toward me, then flew directly overhead about 20-30 feet above my head. and flew over my driveway tandem continued over the treetop.

content.detailedDescription: On thursday nights my girlfriend and i use a friends pool in palm springs ca. last night when i was drying off i happened to be looking up and noticed a large structure like craft with lights moving silently across the sky in a straight line. this craft was not flying in a traditional senses like a plane it was just moving.  my girlfriend was still in the pool so i yelled to her and she was able to see it also. we both where excited to see this and stood outside for a few minutes hoping that it wood return. it was like nothing we had ever seen before, we don't know what it was, we only know that it was real. after about one minute the object was to far away that we lost sight of it.
content.summary: Huge structure with about 7 lights moving silent thru the sky

content.detailedDescription:
On the 28/04/13 i discovered i can do time lapse photography with my new nikon d5100. on my third series  of shots of clouds moving across the sky (500 pics, 10 secs apart, shutter speed 1/400 sec)  i made into a vid.
anyway i was watching the vid when i saw a black spot at top of screen. i finally found the one and only frame and i couldn't believe my eyes. have a look, see what you think. this is a legit pic. the white spec below is a jet liner.
the image was taken at 1148am on 28/04/13. the camera was facing almost directly east. i live in new beith, logan, qld. not very far
from greenbank army camp. your opinion and further analysis by other ufo experts would be very appreciated.
content.summary: Doing timelapse of clouds, one frame has ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was feeding my dog and walked out to throw the empty can in the bin when i noticed a strange light in the sky that did not look like a star. it began moving in erratic, nimble paths and stopped on a dime a number of times. i yelled out to my sister and we grabbed the binoculars and sat observing it for about 20 minutes to half an hour. through the binoculars we could see that it had a shape and was solid, it had about 3 lights, though the number varied as the object moved, we mostly saw 3 main lights coloured red, yellow and pale green. they pulsated a little but did not blink. the object as far as we could tell was triangular, but may well have been circular or disc like as we observed from some distance. the size of the object is difficult to determine as distance is unknown but it was big enough to be identifiable as not any kind of aircraft we have ever seen or know to exist, especially in this area which receives only occasional distant air traffic. the object was too high and too maneuverable to be a helicopter, it also stayed in the sky on the one vague area for too long and made no noise. in addition to this it certainly did not look like a helicopter when observed through binoculars.

during the sighting we noticed a number of planes appear on the horizon, that did not seem like civilian or commercial aircraft due to their speed and lights, as well as our identification of them through binoculars. at least 4 were counted heading toward the object, though significantly lower than it. eventually they disappeared, presumably into the horizon, though the object stayed. whether or not the aircraft were tied to the sighting or not is questionable. 

i would like to also that the object was still visible as i was filling out this report, observable out my window, it disappeared only recently and neither myself or my sister witnessed it disappear, or how it disappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange light hovering in sky, observed from backyard through binoculars, increased airtraffic promptly followed

content.detailedDescription: At 5:15 a.M., while on my roof staring at the sky, i saw an object that was bright white in color moving very slowly across the sky. i wasn't sure what it was at first because it was moving too slow to be a plane. i then grabbed the binoculars that were next to me(because that's all i had with me at the time) so that i could see it more clearly. a few minutes later i noticed that a duller colored object of similar shape had joined it, trailing behind it to the right. a few minutes after that another craft that looked like two "o's" next to each other(like the number 8 on it's side) joined in and completed their triangular shape formation. the figure 8 craft left the formation, without me noticing, but joined back in a few minutes later. without me noticing again, the two that joined the first one had left and the bright white one was left. for around 22 minutes i watched it go in big circles, make "ufo type movements" and also a movement that resembled a ball bouncing between two walls at medium-high speed before losing site of it as it traveled over my head. also, and i'm not sure if there is any way to confirm this, but i also received several images in my left eye(i'm very right eye dominant so when i use binoculars my right eye is open while the left eye is closed)telepathically during the viewing of the craft. some images appeared to me like small video-clips, and others appeared more like files with words and images and possibly blueprints on them. the only image i can remember, because it showed up 3 times or more, resembled what i would describe as a humanoid skull or face with tribal designs covering it. at one point while viewing the craft through the binoculars i believe, but not completely sure, that i saw the same image on the bottom of the craft and at which time the craft appeared to resemble a kite. after i got off the roof, i was looking at the sky to see if i could re-locate the craft again one last time before going inside and i received another image which looked like a kalachakra-type image spinning around multiple times with the same tribal face image in the center. i've never experienced anything like this before and i don't know how it will affect me in the long run, but if somehow i could "access" the received information then it might give me some sort of closure to the whole situation.
content.summary: Three different objects, one object for majority, received telepathic images

content.detailedDescription:
Was returning home on bicycle with friend. foggy night in daly city ca. stopped in schoolyard to chat with friend.  
as the fog was blowing past it had a large gap/opening that revealed the object  very low, right above us at a 75' angle and in my line of sight. 
 i told my friend and we both freaked out and took off asap. 
 i remember riding as fast as i could up the ramp exit from schoolyard and after that details are less clear. 
 i don't remember really sharing this info with my family after the fact.  i'm writing this in the hopes that others may have witnessed this at that time.  
 i'm convinced of two things. 
 it was hiding in the fog and it was the same craft seen in phoenix in the mid 90's   
i would like to know if this craft has been seen before or after my account.  thanks.
content.summary: Foggy night in daly city. on bicycle with friend.  stopped in school yard, fog blowing past reveling ufo. only remember being frightened and rode away asap. can't remember much more detail. don't remember conversations about this after the fact?????

content.detailedDescription: my fiance and i along with out little dog, were driving to vero beach florida from tampa florida to visit out moms for mothers day. it was around 9:30pm on a thursday night heading east on rt 60 toward vero. i looked to my right to see 2 yellow orange lights in the night sky flying at the same altitude but not close enough together for me to think they were the same object. i remember thinking that planes that low shouldnt be flying at the same altitude as it could be dangerous. almost as soon as i had that thought the 2 lights, which looked like ultra bright amber stars fused to 1 light. as soon as that happened i thought...Alright we that's not a airplanes. almost immediately the now one light shot into 3, then shot off maybe 3 or three more. there seemed to be no pattern to it. i remember thinking it looked like some sort of slow moving odd firework. after it shot into these 5-6 orange yellow star lights they all stated rapidly dropping in the sky. we were driving past cow pastures and before they got anywhere near the ground they merged into 1 light again and vanished.I was yelling "whats the heck is that!" "what are those!" over and over. my fiance looked only in time to see the one final light blink out. he started yelling "the yellow orange light??? i saw it, what happened!?". we then drove passed a more wooded area and though we kept our eyes locked on the tree line we saw no more lights. i have never seen anything of the sort. i have been searching online since we got to vero beach at around 10:30pm trying to see if anyone else saw it. i keep seeing one report in google search results from around that time that seems to be reporting the same thing on this site but i cant seem to find the report once i open the link. i hope someone else saw this. it doesnt bother me that i saw it as much as it bothers me that i seem to be the only one. that stretch of 60 is pretty deserted except for cows.
content.summary: Yellow orange lights multiplying ascending dropping and merging before fading

content.detailedDescription: It was around 10;45  may 9 2013 my sister stopped over with her boyfriend to pick up some mail and decided to come in for a little while ...Then as she was about to leave around 11:30ish she mentioned wheres the mail..And i said its in the truck , as i was going outside to get the mail out of my wifes truck i look to my left and see these really big orange orbs at first i saw two then with excitement i ran inside to call my sister her boyfriend  and my wife ,,as me and my sister and her boyfriend ran outside to look,, my wife looked out the 2nd floor window ,, the third orb appeared which then made the shape of a triangle ....  they were very big and really bright orange ... as i ran inside to grab my cellphone to record it i couldnt remember where i had last placed my phone with all the excitement ...I came back out and saw left corner orb go to the left and vanished the one on the right stayed lit for about a minute then disappeared now the one in the front stayed lit for about three minutes ascending up into  the sky then finally disappeared .....I know what a plane looks like and i know what a jet afterburner looks like this was neither very interesteing as they made no noise and were very big ......I hope anyone that seen the same thing i saw would report it besides me my sister and wife also her boyfriend  ..... wow i am still in shock...Someone else had to see this ....As they were so visible ..And big .....Positively u.F.O
content.summary: Three very big orange orbs in triangle formation hovering at the same speed then one went left and disappeared right side light also disappeared and the front orb stayed lit for about 2 3 minutes until disappearing into the sky .....

content.detailedDescription: Back in the early summer of 1993; in cedar city, utah. i was a kid age 13, i was sleeping outside like i always did, i really love sleeping outside on the lawn. anyhow i woke up about 3 am and saw an object in the air approximately less than 500 ft above me, the object was traveling ne, it had no sound. it was a triangle shape with three fire holes at each point of a triangle, i felt like it was another craft of the air force,  i never saw anything like that to this day. i saw it fly over the mountains,  it was a full moon that night, a few minutes later the moon began to be bright orange color. i told my parents what happened that night,  they just blew me off. if anyone has ever seen an object such as this leave a post.
content.summary: Flew overhead in shape of a triangle with three fire holes at each point of the triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back poarch smoking a cig and seen something moving way above the aircraft lane leading into the charliote airport i thought it was odd because there was allready a 747 on aproch i thought it was a choper because there are alot around here but then it accelerated to an incredible speed thats wen i noticed the second one heading right for it just before they collided one swerved to miss and headed right towards the 747 at this point it was weird then the 747 changed his aproch and i knew i was witnessing something , the 747 droped about 15 degress then continued towards charliote airport i looked back to the object and it was hovering then the other one came back i tried calling my mom outside to c it but my cell made an screch and flashed then died from half a battery i looked at my watch and it was dead then my ears started ringing and havent stoped about the time they started ringing i felt tingles allover got weak and blacked out i came to standing an hour later and saw a blackhawk there insted
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like stars till they shot towards echother and allmost crashed into one another

content.detailedDescription: Driving down the 55fwy and saw an orange orb glowing bright in the sky a few hundred feet off the ground. after about 30 seconds it disappeared.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange orb hovering near freeway

content.detailedDescription: My sister, niece, son and i were driving down the atlantic city expressway when i noticed an object in the air. at first, i thought it was a star, but i realized that it was too close to be a star. it was a very bright yellow and light was emanating from it. i quickly turned to my sister and said "***, what in the world is that?" she looked and she had mentioned that she had seen something like it before a few winters ago. by this time the kids are looking out the window and they are beginning to panic. after looking at the object for a few seconds, it shot out what i looked like to me was a ball of fire. the ball was moving slow, and left a trail of light. then the ball came to a complete stop, it was below the main ball of light, but towards the right hand side of it....When the fireball stopped it completely changed to a yellow color just like the first craft, after a few seconds, both balls of light completely disappeared. we were so shocked at what we had seen that we didn't notice how fuzzy the radio had gotten, after a few seconds the radio station we were listening to were back to normal....I would also like to add that earlier in the day we saw what i could only describe as military drones flying in the area, this happened in the duration of 4 hours, we also saw 2 planed that looked like military cargo planed. about 1/2 hour after the sighting we have heard various jet fighters.
content.summary: Drones and military airplanes witnesses all day, we were shocked to see a fireball looking ufo

content.detailedDescription: On 01/01/10 i drove to north carolina, natahala natl. forrest, slick rock, big fat gap regoin to hike , camp. this area is just off u.S. hwy.129, about five miles from deals gap at tennessee, n.C. boarder. hwy. is also known as the dragon.I was about 15 miles from robbinsville, n.C.To the east//the entery into area ,you cross a bridge crossing the stream,right turn// this road you go about 100 yds., to split in road, one turning a sharp right,one straight to a gate about two miles from bridge blocking service road // after about 1/2 miles i came up to a trail called the belden trail// i parked at that trail head, decided to hike to gated road,take that four a while// a have hiked that road and other trails in area serveral times. i began my hike at about 11:00 am it takes about or a little over 30 min. this road runs south ,southwest along a deep valley with stream. after about 4:00 pm i turned around, started back toward truck // and decided to take my time. after about an hour.As, came around a bend , i spotted a bright light that seemed to be halfway up slop ,n. n.E. from that vantage point, across valley ,other side or hwy.129, maybe three miles out. b the time i got back to gate it was nearly dark, i noticed a beem , faint , to my front left, over a near ridge . now as i had been seeing that for a good 11/2 hrs.To two hrs.The light stayed seems in same spott,seemed brighter. hunters light ,maybe, i was thinking// i continued down excess f.S. road toword my truck// about 30min. later i came around a bend, and noticed the light was no longer visable// i was trying to remember if i had noticed no house lights ,or flood lights anytime i took that walk. there is a road that runs along that mountain that runs into a community on one end, and on the ohter end farms and a community to left about 1/4 miles from intersection// this road turns right at crest of paved road that intersect with hwy. 129.That road can excessed by turning left on first left turn 3 miles from deals gapp past a dam .02 miles across from topoco lodge on right// there is one vacation houes about a mile from crest onto that mountain road// one driveway to house about 50 to 100 yrds to right down slope// no other// i had flashlight on watching my step//suddenly a bright white round object appered, and just stayed stationary// after about 30 sec. the object began to slowly decend at an sharp angle till it dissapered behind slop angle down right to left.Ridge slopped at steep angle// i  rocked back one my heels// i felt very unnerved and a sense of fear, quickly// i turned off flashlight and began a quick step back 1/2 mile to my truck// my thoughts  was, did i see the same thing that i had seen for past 2 hrs.Or so// i had park behind a slope that blocked any other view //. i was reluctent to start vehicle for the thought ,what if it would bring some attention from that thing. but i started up turned around and headed back to hwy. 129// when i got back to hwy., i decided to turn toward robbinsville with cross between  brave to not so brave // the dirrection runs up to were the creek  enters chioa creek. i never seen it again// i have never seen anything that i called a strange object in sky// as a camper and hiker, my love for the out doors i have always loved to look skyward .I known of flooting latern that can be mistaken for ufo// i dont believe that this was the case//no sound of fireworks, no gun shots // i think about this a lot and have told few// i wonder if there was an object that was detected in area by usaf or traffic control,any airport// im very much want to know what i saw//
content.summary: A bright white round object no sound seemed out of nowere it ,solid no other features after apperance and vanished after 21/2 hrs about 20 min  apeared ,hovered then decended behind ridge at steep angle

content.detailedDescription: I was at intersection of richard o. and 15 mile road in sterling heights, michigan driving north.  i saw a cluster of red, green, yellow and blue lights far in the sky above the tree line due north from my position. the lights hovered for about a second or two and then moved at a very high rate of speed and disapeared from my view.
content.summary: Cluster of red yellow green blue lights ascending fast

content.detailedDescription:
I took these pictures and did not see the bal until after i looked at the pictures. i have kept them and have wondered if it is just dust reflection on the lens of the camera or something else. #1 & 2 pics have bal. #3 has orange light and i think that is a house light across the street from picture location. #4 has bal in the sky. i was at this location the other day and checked to see if there are any light towers or anything that would have caused the bal in #4 pic; there is not. just thought you may like to see. i have been a member of mufon for many years. ok to contact if you need or want any more information. i have never shown these images to the people that are in the pictures.
thanks, wade
content.summary: Ball of light (bal) in photo

content.detailedDescription:
I witnessed numerous crafts up in the oil fields. they are probably interested in the natural gas plant that was being built west of williston.
 it was noticed at night while i was waiting for my truck to unload, i watched it twinkling multi-colors for about 5-7 minutes. then it was exactly like the trail of a starship on star trek. it went away to the right side of the moon, and was out of site within 1-2 seconds. it left with an orange trail, but a millasecond later in the second i watched, it went black for about another millasecondthen it must have hit another gear as i watched it leave the line to the eye was not straight but kinda arched as it went away. i could not believe i had witnessed thre speed of light or faster? i had mentioned it to another driver, the same night he seen a shooting star just stop around the same area in the sky.

i have more sitings that i do have witnesses for. about 4 more for sure!!

these are not contrieved stories. have have trained eyes for details and memories.
content.summary: It might have been a mile across, distance 20 miles up ?

content.detailedDescription: I was out in the mid summer, looking at the stars, and i saw something that all the sudden, i thought maybe, it was a satellite. but now, i realize, if a satellite was to be going that fast, it would probably burn up. it was clearly up around 36,000 feet, and i saw lights... it wouldn't have been an aircraft, because of all the colors, and the sort of aurora that it seemed to trail. i would watch it, and then think, i had no idea satellites could go that fast. the object started to move to the right, and then it moved back into its pattern. it's colors were listed above, and i don't even know at this point if it should be counted as a sighting. i was 8 then, and i don't think i knew.
content.summary: Not a clear image, did not look like a satellite.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10: 30 p.M. when, in the southeast, i saw a pulsating pale blue light in the sky, moving to the southeast, about 20 degrees above the horizon when it was at its highest angle, that was pulsating from on to off in a sine wave pattern of about 3 to 6 seconds following the type of path that a non-turning plane would take. it seemed to take about as long to travel its path as a normal commercial plane or propeller plane would. the light then became too dim to see anymore when it traveled to about 10 degrees above the horizon in the southeast.
content.summary: Pale blue object pulsating on-to-off-to-on in a sine wave pattern of about 5 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
We were camping at my friend's camp site on cayuga lake ny.  it was turning to evening and we were sitting on the edge of a dock. the fog mist was coming on the lake for the evening and then we saw what looked like a blimp in the distance across the lake.  we just sat and watched the object thought nothing of it. slowly without a sound and not disturbing the lake mist it approached toward us. nothing to to scarce or worry us until it was above out heads about 300 feet.  it then stopped.  it was a very large circular disk and had a dome feature underneath. it was directly above us while we were sitting on the dock. three light's came from the bottom dome in red, green and blue. the light felt very hot so we panic'd and ran. i ran into the wood's and my friend ran under his family's camper. it seems like there was a time lose in that it was later than what it should be. my friend doesn't recall anything later when i questioned him about that event year's later. 
the craft was silent until it left us, the sound became pulsacting when it left.
alex lakota
content.summary: Over flight of ufo scanning cayuga lake.

content.detailedDescription:
my husband and i at that time were driving home after a day of work on the base when we notion this object low in the sky off the driver's side.
it cigar shaped very bright. we wanted to get a closer look at it but i don't remember doing that. i only remeber i was back at our apartment. it was very strange and i blocked it out of my memory for years. my husband and i never talked about it. i have told family and my second husband about it but i don't think they believe me. i wish i could recall more.
          
                                           sincerely
                                      christine a. younger
content.summary: Very bright mostly white with colored lights off afb.I know it wasn't our military or of our earth.

content.detailedDescription: I was heading home from work and was coming up to a bridge going over a river. when i looked to the south west i saw three reddish orange lights just above the tree line in the shape of a triangle. i stopped to get a better look and as i was pulling my phone out to get video each light went out one after the other. stayed there for 20 minutes after hopping to see it again but it never appeared again.
content.summary: Was looking over the water and saw three orange red lights in the shape of a triangle. after about 30 seconds of watching it each light went out one after the other.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming out the back yard and i looked across the street and there it was.Not above the trees but mid way between them there were no leaves on the trees so i saw it plain as day.It was 4pm so it was still daytime,it was octogan shaped with big red lights all the way around.And it was sitting still in the sky,no one else was around to show it to but i saw what i saw and its not the first time i saw one.I came into the house and called my husband to see if he saw it.He was at the store up the street,but it was already gone when he came out the store.I am a true believer we are not alone.Then on april 20th me,my son and my mothr inlaw saw 12 objects in the sky they were bright stayed in the sky for awhile and then just disappeared.Now this time i had witnesses.Well thats my story and i am glad i got to share it with someone.
content.summary: I was coming out the back yard and saw it between 2 houses across street it sat there for a min.Then it was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
My friends dropped me off at a c-train station so i could take the train the rest of the way home after a board meeting. it was just after 9 pm, twilight, sky was still pretty blue, with just a few scattered clouds. i crossed the tracks to get to the side of the terminal i needed to be on, bought my ticket and when i turned around and stepped out onto the platform two round dark objects caught my eye. they were visible above some tall trees on the other side of the block. they did not seem vary large but looked like they were very high in the sky. they hovered and did not seem to emit any sound. they were both in close proximity to each other. they were more or less stationary only moving slightly. like they were being rocked about by the wind but were maintaining the same position.Kind of like buoys in water.They did not emit any light. the one on the right looked like it had several much smaller dark objects spinning around it. kind of looked like a swarm of flies buzzing around it. there were very few other people around, but no one else seemed to take notice and i did not point them out to anyone. i tried to take a picture but could not get a good shot with the camera on my phone as the objects were to far away. i observed them in this state for about 3-4 min until the train arrived. i sat in a seat where i could continue to observe the objects through the window. they seemed to remain still as the train traveled north. i lost track of them after the train passed through an underground tunnel. we have a busy international airport here so i observe planes and helicopters in the sky regularly and these objects did not seem at all similar to that type of craft. i considered that they may be balloons or kites of some kind but it seemed odd how they were so high up and not moving at all how you would expect a kite or ballon to move. i know some commercial remote control drones can hover and go quite high, but there was two of them and very close together and no noise and i could not see any apparatus that devises like that typically have. ie: hellicopter blades, wings or fans. 
i'm hoping someone else saw it or if anyone could give me an explanation of what these objects might have been, i would be curious to know as i have never seen anything quite like that in the sky before.
content.summary: Two dark objects, no lights, looked circular but hard to tell. not sure how large or how high in the sky. i would estimate they were the size of a small airplane or hellicopter. hovered with no noise.

content.detailedDescription: It was a warm night the sun had just gone down but it was still a little light in the sky. we always sit on the back porch and look at the sky,our  back porch looks over an open field and in the distance you can see mountains,but in the field there are some very tall trees.I was looking up in the sky at the stars toward the west were the sun had just set and all of a sudden a green glowing orb appeared out of sky above the tallest tree in the field but i could tell that it was at least a mile or so away. it moved a little and when i grabbed my husbands face and pushed his head around i said look and it hesitated above the tree id say for at least 10 seconds and seemed like it went down behind the mountain,it did not make any noise but it glowed bright green and seemed like it had a darker core to it.Of course everyone we have told think were crazy but i know what i saw and both my husband and i have not forgotten.Found out about this sight on tv watching alien mysteries on the destination channell.We are still a little disturbed by this event.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Me and my husband were sitting on back porch when i seen the green glowing orb flying just above the tree line of a distant mountain i grabbed my husbands face and turned his head and said look and he also seen it.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife @ i stepped on south facing deck for puff on cig,we both quit months ago,we're cheating! my wife said,is that a satellite ?,pointing to a bright star in between small round clouds.I said no,that's a star, the clouds are moving.Hold up your finger,just below the star and you,ll see it's not moving.I looked straight up and in between the clouds there were 3 small clusters of lights in a triangle shape.I told my wife to look!! whats that!!
my first thought was that it was 3 jets in a real tight formation.I said they must be going to afghanistan.I don't know if that's the way! but that's what my first thought was, military.The lights we're a dim red,not blinking or anything.I couldn't tell the speed as the little round clouds covered the lights.Of course!!! for the 5 or 6 seconds i did observe the lights they didn't appear to be moving very fast.My assumption was that they were going due north so i turned around looking straight up over the house, waiting for a break in the clouds. while i was looking straight up,kind of scanning above ,my wife said look!!.She was behind me looking over me and to the northeast.Out of the clouds came a bright solid, not blinking light heading to the south east.Fast!! i looked at that then back up over the house to see the two, white blinking lights of two jets that appeared to be in pursuit of the object.The object went out of sight to the south east while i was still watching the jets, heading the same way.The clouds broke enough and i looked at the right time to see the jets go from heading due north and turn to the southeast. now, i'm not sure if i even seen the jets when i first saw the triangle shape lights. they were, i'm guessing to the south,obscured by the small broken clouds. the time was 9.47 pm may 8th. i called the national ufo reporting center in seattle wash. and tv 7@4 news.No one else had yet called.Today, the 9th,thursday, i heard of other people seeing the same event. i'm still waiting to hear the other accounts.
content.summary: Large triangle with 2 or3 jets in persuit

content.detailedDescription: May 8, 2013. 10:30 pm approx.  felt the need to go outside last night. i was standing in my driveway smoking a cigarette looking up at the stars.  i was relaxed and wondering "how do i know these are stars or planets?"  i dont know why i thought that. as i was standing there, looking at the stars in the ne sky, one of the stars i was looking at just faded to nothing. i laughed to myself, thinking "well i guess they are not all stars or planets out there".  again, it did not move, blink, change color or anything, it looked just like every other star in the sky.  so i continued to watch for a.Few more minutes. i noticed at that point a plane flying north from the south east. (i knew it was a plane because of the blinking lights). it flew exactly to the same area the disappearing star had been.  it was not going fast, it may have been just a commercial plane, no jet noise or anything, but i thought it was noteworthy. the whole event lasted less than 10 min.
content.summary: Star (?) in ne sky nm, watched it for a min., then it just faded away. did not move ever.

content.detailedDescription: It was 38 years ago this month, but i remember it like it was yesterday.  my friend and i were driving to her house when i casually looked out the window up at the sky and i saw some kind of rapidly dropping light, which fell and disappeared, similar to a shooting star.  i dismissed it as that, until i looked out again a few minutes later and saw the same light moving in odd directions, very fast.  it would appear, zip vertically for a second then disappear again, only to reappear elsewhere in the sky, dart up diagonally, then disappear again.  this happened probably about 4 times, then stopped, i didn't see it after that.  that is until we got to my friend's house and stepped out of the car.  above her house (which was a large, five bedroom, two level ranch home), no more than 500 feet from the ground, was an enormous, disc shaped craft, dull silver-gray metallic, still and silent, with a smaller disc shaped area underneath, lighted all around with alternating yellowish lights and portholes.  we stood there speechless looking at this thing.  what still boggles my mind to this day is how an object that large could be completely silent, even when it starting moving.  my friend's dad came to the front door - as i guess he saw us just standing there looking up - and we screamed to him to come outside and look at this object above his house.  he laughed at us and shut the door.  the craft then proceeded to move horizontally very slowly, and it had a red transparent beam moving in sync with it, scanning the creek behind my friend's house. they were studying/scanning the creek, we could see the end of the beam in the water. after it passed the creek, it continued moving and proceeded to move at the same slow rate of speed down her street, toward a private farm which had a open pasture.  we got back in the car and followed until we reached the farm and could go no further, but we could still see it.  it stopped over the pasture, revved up it's "engine" which sounded like three airplanes starting at the same time, and took off diagonally so fast, it was gone from sight in approximately 5 seconds. and that was it, we never saw it again.  i went home, got out my binoculars, and sat outside until about 1:00am looking for it, but i never saw it again, and neither did my friend.  i will never forget that as long as i live.
content.summary: Large, silent, hovering craft, moving in sync with red transparent beam which was scanning creek behind home.,
